content.rendered:
Human Resources (DOT experience required)

Tulsa-area business seeking a Human Resources candidate with DOT compliance knowledge and working experience. Business provides complete commercial and industrial grease trap services, including pumping and disposing grease trap waste. Family owned and operated business, serving Oklahoma, Arkansas, Kansas, Missouri, Texas, Mississippi, Louisiana, and Tennessee for over 50 years. *Position is temporary, about 12 weeks, with the potential of longer placement *Candidates MUST have DOT experience *Compensation negotiations will begin at $18/hr, depending on experience and background.
